EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Amer_BGA_MSP_Nurture.Email 1.2
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for interest in our recent infographic featured by Avionics magazine titled “How to Control the Unexpected Costs of Aircraft Maintenance.” As a follow up, we wanted to share some relevant resources you also might like:
- Honeywell Maintenance Service Plans: Choose the one right for your aircraft <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/maintenance-and-service-plans/maintenance-service-plan-avionics-helicopters?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp&utm_content=nurture]]>. - Time Well Spent: Read our blog about Nine Ways to Use Aircraft Downtime <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2020/04/time-well-spent-aircraft-downtime?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp&utm_content=nurture]]>. - Predictive Insights: Interested in the value PI can bring to your aircraft? Listen to our podcast <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/podcasts/predictive-insights?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp&utm_content=nurture]]>. - Looking for other Honeywell Aerospace solutions? You can find them here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_bga_msp&utm_content=nurture]]>.
Happy flying.
The Honeywell Team
